name: youlag
description: Youlag is a self-hosted latency and response tracking tool for services, visualizing delays and outages over time. It aims to provide quick, intuitive insight into user-perceived performance.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Measure response times for web services and APIs to identify performance degradation

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View latency trends over time with charts and graphs that highlight spikes and patterns

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set latency limits that trigger notifications when services exceed acceptable response times

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Store and analyze past performance metrics to identify long-term trends and recurring issues
